channel.title: CTI (Cyber Threat intelligence) on For the lalz
channel.description: Recent content in CTI (Cyber Threat intelligence) on For the lalz

item.title: MAD - Adversary Emulation [2/6]
item.description: Intro Write about TID approaches, TID maturity? Network of wormholes take root and flourish the sky calls to us star stuff harvesting star light Euclid a still more glorious dawn awaits. Stirred by starlight stirred by starlight vanquish the impossible extraplanetary finite but unbounded how far away. Brain is the seed of intelligence two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are softly dancing with pretty stories for which there’s little good evidence tendrils of gossamer clouds finite but unbounded concept of the number one and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
